bill.summary: 5/14/1998--Introduced. Urges the President to: (1) immediately call upon his friends, former associates and appointees, and the associates of those individuals, who have asserted fifth amendment privileges or fled the country to avoid testifying in congressional investigations, to come forward and testify fully and truthfully before the relevant congressional committees; and (2) use all legal means at his disposal to compel people who have left the country to return and cooperate with the investigation.
